page.title: 16 Recreation
page.content: 77% make regular use of the Public Library,75% make regular use of the Swimming Baths,47% make regular use of the Sports Centre. 10% of the families often holiday abroad,33% occasionally holiday abroad,57% never holiday abroad. Favorite pastimes of adults (in order of preference) reading,knitting,gardening,swimming,go lf,keeping fit,football,needlework/sewing,walking ,horses,caravaning,D.I.Y,boating,cars, jogging,music,cricket,arts and crafts,snooker,pool,badminton,squash,b owls,cookery,dancing,computing,televis ion,family outings,model making, drama ,showing dogs,photography,radio,car rallying,motor racing,bee keeping,motor cycling,weightlifting, gliding,cycling,wine making ,yoga, antiques,pigeon racing,chess,rugby.
